attributes.additional_details:
Our National Anthem God save our King, when sang at sporting events is so old & lacks any motivation, player's appear to look uninterested.
With our country being more a diverse country we need our anthem to represents all people of England, not just a monarch.
attributes.background: A diversity anthem that represents all of us.  That has more meaning for this country and when sung it will give our players a real boost. The crowds in the stadium & the people at home will get a fantastic feeling, that sends a burning tingling sensation.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here: https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
